marklogic.body: Don't you people have jobs? Families? Something better to do with your time than to sit on here 24 hours a day speculating and slamming APD when you don't give a crap about Samantha! Your Cold, apathetic hearts make me sad to be an Alaskan. I wish you'd all step away from the computer and go hand out some flyers, or repost them from FB or whatever. Stop drawing conclusions/theories without having all the facts. Most of you are just disgusting human beings who get Off on someone else'sÂ tragedy. Shame on you. I thought Alaskans were better than this.
